price: 85. Isi abbaa kee isi marak Yallak kalah maca taqbudeniih iyye waqdi ken assacakkuk?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
